data.name: Penguin Slide
data.detailed_description:
Penguin Slide is a first-person physics based casual "speedrunning" game where the player is tasked at helping Flippy the Penguin as he runs away from the City Zoo on his mission to end global warming. Slide your way through diverse environments as Flippy travels farther and farther away from his human made enclosure, dodging obstacles and collecting coins and upgrades, on his epic journey to find a fabled secret U.S Cold War "cryo-weapon" to cool the planet and save the eco-system!

Features:
• High Speed Gameplay
• Multiple Environments
• Highscore
• Steam Achievements
• Collectables
• In-game Store
• Fun Gameplay!
data.about_the_game:
Penguin Slide is a first-person physics based casual "speedrunning" game where the player is tasked at helping Flippy the Penguin as he runs away from the City Zoo on his mission to end global warming. Slide your way through diverse environments as Flippy travels farther and farther away from his human made enclosure, dodging obstacles and collecting coins and upgrades, on his epic journey to find a fabled secret U.S Cold War "cryo-weapon" to cool the planet and save the eco-system!

Features:
• High Speed Gameplay
• Multiple Environments
• Highscore
• Steam Achievements
• Collectables
• In-game Store
• Fun Gameplay!
data.short_description: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
